message.entry: addColumn may not be called after adding a row.
columnName must be a character vector, scalar numeric, or a hyperlink.
addRow may not be called until all columns are added.
Cell contents must be a 1xn or mx1 vector.
You must provide cell contents for each column.
Values must be scalar numeric or character vector.
TEXT must be a character vector or a numeric scalar.
HREF parameter must be a character vector.
